# Goals: software

To do modern statistic you have to be familiar with modern software.

-   Get you more familiar with R and RStudio

-   mutate() - make new variables

-   ggplot() - make graphs

# Goals: statistics

Idea of a hypothesis test.

**Question: Are babies with female sex born at the same proportion to those born male?**

$$
H_o: p_{female} = p_{male} \\
H_a:  p_{female} \ne p_{male}
$$
